metadata.name: Sample Network Trust Registry
metadata.description: The Sample Network Trust Registry is a global registry of organizations that have agreed to accept the Sample Network Trust Registry as a source of trust for digital identity verification and attestation.

metadata.name: Sample Network
metadata.description: The Sample Network is a sample network

registries.name: Sample Network Trust Registry
registries.description: The Sample Network Trust Registry is a global registry of organizations that have agreed to accept the Sample Network Trust Registry as a source of trust for digital identity verification and attestation.

loa1.name: Level of Assurance 1
loa1.description: Level of Assurance 1 (LOA1) is the lowest level of assurance.

loa2.name: Level of Assurance 2
loa2.description: Level of Assurance 2 (LOA2) is a medium level of assurance

did:web:samplenetwork.com:authorization:.name: Authorization Type 1
did:web:samplenetwork.com:authorization:.description: Authorization Type 1 is a type of authorization that is used to grant access to a resource or service.

did:web:samplenetwork.com:authorization:.description: Authorization Type 2 is a type of authorization that is used to grant access to a resource or service.
